p: In this context, public engagement is promoted in different ways. The EAT-Lancet Commission on Food, Planet, Health [ 70] proposed a Planetary Health Diet, a plant-based diet to feed the growing global population within the boundaries of a safe operating space for food systems. The “Meatless Mondays” initiative to cut back on meat consumption has also received considerable attention in recent years and has been adopted by some public schools in an effort to improve children’s eating habits [ 71].
